items.text: Once upon a time, there lived a young girl in a small village.
items.translation_uz: Bir vaqtlar, kichik qishloqda yosh qiz yashardi.

items.text: The old man walked slowly through the forest, looking for mushrooms.
items.translation_uz: Chol qo'ziqorin izlab, sekin o'rmon bo'ylab yurdi.

items.text: She opened the mysterious letter and began to read carefully.
items.translation_uz: U sirli xatni ochdi va diqqat bilan o'qiy boshladi.

items.text: The children discovered a hidden treasure in the old garden.
items.translation_uz: Bolalar eski bog'da yashirin xazina topdilar.

items.text: After years of traveling, he finally returned to his hometown.
items.translation_uz: Ko'p yillik sayohatdan so'ng, u nihoyat ona shahriga qaytdi.

items.text: The brave knight fought the dragon to save the princess.
items.translation_uz: Jasur ritsar malikani qutqarish uchun ajdaho bilan jang qildi.

items.text: Nobody believed his story, but it turned out to be true.
items.translation_uz: Hech kim uning hikoyasiga ishonmadi, lekin u haqiqat bo'lib chiqdi.

items.text: The detective examined the crime scene looking for clues.
items.translation_uz: Detektiv jinoyat joyini izlar izlab ko'zdan kechirdi.

items.text: They sailed across the ocean searching for new lands.
items.translation_uz: Ular yangi yerlarni izlab okean bo'ylab suzishdi.

items.text: The magic spell transformed the frog into a handsome prince.
items.translation_uz: Sehrli afsun baqani kelishgan shahzodaga aylantirdi.

items.text: Her dream of becoming a famous singer finally came true.
items.translation_uz: Uning mashhur qo'shiqchi bo'lish orzusi nihoyat amalga oshdi.

items.text: The two friends promised to meet again someday in the future.
items.translation_uz: Ikki do'st kelajakda qaytadan uchrashishga va'da berishdi.
